summary:
### January 2025 Summary for BuidlGuidl/abi.ninja

- **Major Improvements:**
  - Merged PR #170 updated several packages, including rainbowkit and viem, and resolved issues with the Sepolia RPC, enhancing overall functionality.

- **Bug Fixes:**
  - Closed issue #169 addressed the Sepolia RPC downtime by updating the viem version, ensuring better connectivity.

- **Other Pull Requests:**
  - Two additional PRs (#172 and #171) were closed, contributing to local storage functionality and network data management, respectively.

- **Overall Theme:**
  - The focus this month was on improving package dependencies and addressing critical RPC issues, which enhances the reliability of the application.

topIssues.title: bug: sepolia rpc from viem is down (our viem ver is old)

topPRs.title: Save ABI to localstorage on chain id 31337
